data_table.description: Subject ID, consent group, affection status, and study name variable of participants with or without breast or prostate cancer and involved in the "The Breast and Prostate Cancer Cohort Consortium (BPC3) GWAS of Aggressive Prostate Cancer and ER- Breast Cancer" project.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC
variable.value: Disease-Specific (Breast, Ovarian, or Endometrial Disease, MDS) (DS-BOED-MDS)
Cancer in all age groups, other disease in adults only and methods (CADM)
